title: Curried mango & chickpea pot
ingredients: ½ small red chilli , finely sliced (deseeded if you want less heat)
instructions: Combine the chickpeas, yogurt, lemon and korma paste in a bowl, then toss with the carrot, cabbage, spinach and mango. Tip into your lunchbox or an airtight container and scatter with the nigella seeds and red chilli.
